name: encrypt simple string values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Only values are Base64 encoded.

name: encrypt nested objects (depth 1)
description: Keys stay plaintext. Nested objects are stringified then Base64 encoded.

name: encrypt null values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Null is stringified to 'null' then Base64 encoded.

name: encrypt boolean values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Booleans are stringified then Base64 encoded.

name: encrypt number values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Numbers are stringified then Base64 encoded.

name: encrypt array values
description: Keys stay plaintext. Arrays are JSON stringified then Base64 encoded.

name: handle empty objects
description: Empty objects have no keys or values to encrypt.

name: encrypt deeply nested structures
description: Keys stay plaintext. All nested objects at depth 1 are stringified and Base64 encoded.
